name: pdf-viewer-component
label: PDF Viewer
description: A configurable PDF viewer component for displaying and navigating PDF documents with coordinate-based highlighting

properties.name: documentUrl
properties.label: Document URL
properties.description: URL of the PDF document to display (e.g., /sys_attachment.do?sys_id=xxx)

properties.name: coordinates
properties.label: Coordinates (D String)
properties.description: Coordinate string for highlighting. Format: D(page,x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3,x4,y4). Multiple coordinates separated by semicolon.

properties.name: zoomMode
properties.label: Zoom Mode
properties.description: How to handle zoom on load

properties.name: showControls
properties.label: Show Controls
properties.description: Whether to show the navigation and zoom controls

properties.name: showPageNav
properties.label: Show Page Navigation
properties.description: Whether to show page navigation controls

properties.name: highlightColor
properties.label: Highlight Color
properties.description: Color for coordinate highlights (hex or rgba)

properties.name: height
properties.label: Component Height
properties.description: Height of the component (CSS value, e.g., 100%, 600px)

actions.name: PDF_VIEWER_LOAD_DOCUMENT
actions.label: Load Document
actions.description: Load a PDF document from URL

actions.name: PDF_VIEWER_NAVIGATE_TO_COORDINATES
actions.label: Navigate to Coordinates
actions.description: Navigate to and highlight coordinates in the PDF

dispatches.name: PDF_VIEWER#DOCUMENT_LOADED
dispatches.label: Document Loaded
dispatches.description: Dispatched when a PDF document finishes loading

dispatches.name: PDF_VIEWER#PAGE_CHANGED
dispatches.label: Page Changed
dispatches.description: Dispatched when the current page changes
